The North East is lighting up today with solid 5 ft @ 8s ENE swell and light N winds at 11 mph. Check out Saltburn Point and Saltburn Beach for the best conditions, especially during their prime tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 3 ft @ 6s with fresh S winds at 31 mph, making it a poor day for surf. Day after, the swell continues to fade to 2 ft @ 6s, with SSW winds at 21 mph, keeping it quiet. Best: today.
